alert.note: Alert for Boone; Hamilton; Hardin; Marshall; Story (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 2:56PM CDT until May 07 at 3:45PM CDT by NWS DesMoines
info.description: The National Weather Service in Des Moines has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Story County in central Iowa... Northwestern Marshall County in central Iowa... Southern Hardin County in central Iowa... Southeastern Hamilton County in central Iowa... Northeastern Boone County in central Iowa... * Until 345 PM CDT. * At 256 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Story City, or 9 miles north of Ames, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Roland around 305 PM CDT. McCallsburg and Garden City around 310 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Zearing, Clemons and St. Anthony. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 113 and 130. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
